ygData.subject: Re: Who's who at the Predacon base, and how many are there?
ygData.msgSnippet: Surprised at the response he d received Phobia sat back. Very well but you have yet to give me your name for my OFICIAL report. My business, which I have

Surprised at the response he'd received Phobia sat back. "Very well 
but you have yet to give me your name for my OFICIAL report. My 
business, which I have stated, and you Obviously distrust, is to 
pledge my loyalty to your Predacon commander."
It was rare to find a predacon who showed a backbone, this could be 
an interesting experiment.

"You obviously have me at a disadvantage so how many should I expect 
at my coordinates?"

A simple rule for a Predacon to remember, never show your strengths, 
and pretend to give in to your weaknesses.

 --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::DarkMouse:;
> 
> She opened up the link,"I don't care what you think of my 
> intellegence levels. Please state your business here. You said 
Scorge 
> gave you the wrong coordinants. And that your ship needs repairs. 
You 
> may land on the boarder of the terratory. If you proceed anyfuther 
> into our domain, you will be fired upon.  Land your craft now!"
> She knew that if any other pred were at her console, things would 
> have been different. Any other Pred would have let the ship into 
> thier space and tried totake over everything jsut to impress 
> Megatron.  But with all that was going on, she didn't want to take 
> any chances. 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "Excuse me, was there some piece of my hail which was 
> misinterprated, 
> > is my translator going bad?" Phobia knew that his questions may 
> cause 
> > a light response from the base. A damaged unknown ship is always 
an 
> > interesting target. "My name is Phobia, and unless I have the 
> > coordinates wrong that Scourge sent me wrong, which I seriously 
> > doubt, then Like yourselves I am a Predacon come to pledge his 
> > allegiance to the predacon commander."
> > 
> > "Now if you would please allow me to land before I'm forced to 
take 
> > my association, and equipment elsewhere." While you're at it give 
> me 
> > your identification so when I fill out my report you can either 
be 
> > recommended for your intelligence, for allowing me a landing 
> permit, 
> > or chastised for your incompetence when I leave." After dealing 
> with 
> > Predacons his whole active function he knew how to press the 
right 
> > buttons. Indulge their sense of self worth and they won't bother 
> with 
> > proper channels so they can hog the credit.
> >
